source.c9edee2c:
c=Counter(data['listed_in'])
genre=c.most_common(15)
movie=[]
count=[]
for i in genre:
    movie.append(i[0])
    count.append(i[1])
    
movie.reverse()
count.reverse()
    
print(movie)
print(count)
